      Finds all unique partners that own the position from the given list of PositionApplications
      void runScheduledEmailNotifications()
      Scheduled to run at 5:00PM each day (MON - FRI only).
      All new applications that have not been sent to the partner (where PositionApplication#isViewed() = false) are fetched, and email notifications are sent to their respective owning partners.
      void sendContactUsEmail​(ContactForm contactForm)
      Composes and sends an email to the wilma dev address containing Contact Us form information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ApplicationNotificationService

        public ApplicationNotificationService()

    • Method Detail

      • runScheduledEmailNotifications

        @Scheduled(cron="0 0 17 ? * MON-FRI")
public void runScheduledEmailNotifications()
        Scheduled to run at 5:00PM each day (MON - FRI only).
        All new applications that have not been sent to the partner (where PositionApplication#isViewed() = false) are fetched, and email notifications are sent to their respective owning partners.

      • getNewApplications

        public java.util.Set<PositionApplication> getNewApplications()
        Get all position applications that are marked as un-viewed (viewed = false). This implies that the application has not yet been sent to (or viewed by) the position owner (Partner)
        Returns:
        A set of distinct PositionApplications that have not been sent to their respective partner

      • getPartnersToNotify

        public java.util.Set<Partner> getPartnersToNotify​(java.util.Set<PositionApplication> applications)
        Finds all unique partners that own the position from the given list of PositionApplications
        Parameters:
        applications - The set of PositionApplications
        Returns:
        A set of Partners extracted from the list of applications

      • getApplicationsByPartner

        public java.util.Set<PositionApplication> getApplicationsByPartner​(java.util.Set<PositionApplication> applications,
                                                                   Partner partner)
        Get all applications having a position owner matching the given partner.
        Parameters:
        applications - The set of applications
        partner - The partner to search
        Returns:
        A set of applications ONLY where Position#getPartner() equals the given partner

      • composeMailMessage

        public java.lang.String composeMailMessage​(Partner partner,
                                           java.util.Set<PositionApplication> applications)
        Composes a String message that will form the body of an email notification. For example: 
             Hi Microsoft, you have new position applications!

      Position ID: 35
      Student: tommy_tester
      Email: tommy.tester@gmail.com
      Message: Here, the student would write some message to be passed on to the Partner
      Files:
       â€¢ willy-wonka.png - http://localhost:8080/api/v1/partners/view-attachment/31
        Parameters:
        partner - The partner who owns each position in the given applications
        applications - The collection of application instances
        Returns:
        A single string message to be sent as an email to the given partner

      • sendContactUsEmail

        public void sendContactUsEmail​(ContactForm contactForm)
        Composes and sends an email to the wilma dev address containing Contact Us form information. 
              From: Test User

      Email: test@email.com

      Details: This email works as expected.
        Parameters:
        contactForm - The details from the contact form entered by the user.
